newsitem.title: USA: PHLX says to list options on five stocks.
newsitem.headline: PHLX says to list options on five stocks.

text.p: The Philadelphia Stock Exchange (PHLX) said on Wednesday it would list options on five stocks on August 30.
The exchange said it would introduce options on Atrix Laboratories Inc, Cross Timbers Oil Co, Falcon Drilling Co, Transaction System Architects Inc and Werner Enterprises Inc.
Options on Atrix Labs, Cross Timbers and Falcom Drilling will have initial expiration months of September, October, November and February, the PHLX said.
Transaction System and Werner Enterprises will have initial expiration months of September, October, December and March, the exchange said.

Opening strike prices will be 10, 12-1/2 and 15 for Atrix Labs, 20, 22-1/2 and 25 for Cross Timbers and Falcon Drilling, and 25, 30 and 35 for Transaction Systems. Opening strikes for Werner Enterprises will be 15, 17-1/2 and 20.

Susquehanna Investment Group will be the specialist for Atrix Labs and Transaction Systems and TFM Investment Group will be the specialist for Cross Timbers and Werner. Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist for Falcon Drilling.
